snippet: David Ferrer, the world’s fourth-ranked player, became the first high seed to tumble out of the men’s event, losing to the big-serving Kevin Anderson in the second round.
abstract: Kevin Anderson defeats David Ferrer in second round of BNP Paribas Open in Indian Wells, Calif; other tennis news noted.
lead_paragraph: David Ferrer, the world’s fourth-ranked player, became the first high seed to tumble out of the men’s event, losing to the big-serving Kevin Anderson in the second round.

headline.seo: David Ferrer Out in Second Round at BNP Paribas Open
headline.main: Ferrer Out in Second Round at BNP Paribas Open
